attributes.action: THE UK MUST BOYCOTT ISRAEL UNTIL IT COMPLIES WITH INTERNATIONAL LAW
attributes.additional_details: International laws are there for a reason, and the governments that allow Israel to continue its brutal occupation and subjugation of Palestinians are complicit in this brutality. We call upon all governments to apply sanctions on Israel, as it must not be allowed to continue to break International law with impunity. We ask our government to explain why it allows the occupation to continue while maintaining its friendship with a state which acts in this way.
attributes.background: Israel must end its settlement activity and illegal occupation of Palestinian land. It is illegal under International law. Israel must cease its expansion and occupation of all foreign territories. We call on the UK Government to boycott Israel until such time as it complies with International law.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition in its current form as it does not call for a clear action from the UK Government and Parliament. Were you to start a petition calling on the UK Government to boycott Israeli companies, or for the Government to cut diplomatic ties with Israel over its action, then we could consider it.
